Find out all the secrets and why this "lost" show never made it to the archives!

episodes.seriesTitle: The Best Show with Tom Scharpling
episodes.title: WELCOME TO THE VOID: Tom Makes a Big Announcement, A Voicemail From Chad Gufton and More!
episodes.summary: Tom makes a big announcement! Chad Gufton in Pepperbridge leaves a voicemail. Tom asks the listeners to help identify the one untagged song in his iTunes.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Best Show with Tom Scharpling
episodes.title: FLY LIKE AN EAGLE: Tom Pays Tribute To His Father, A Call From Mark "The Arm" Rample And The Deletion Of MASH.
episodes.summary: Tom pays tribute to his father & speaks with Mark “The Arm” Rample about grunge & baseball. Tom also talks about Billy Joel & the deletion of M*A*S*H.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Best Show with Tom Scharpling
episodes.title: A Look Back At The Best
episodes.summary: The Best Show crew sits in for Tom and plays some of the great moments in the history of show, both the past and current incarnations. Captain Sully Sullenberger! Tom vs Billy Crystal! AP Mike vs Gary the Squirrel! Plus, highlights from the past three weeks!

episodes.seriesTitle: The Best Show with Tom Scharpling
episodes.title: Rev It Up In 2014
episodes.summary: Tom's brother Ron calls in to discuss his new podcast and recount his pro football career! Tom tells the story of getting robbed at Ikea and wonders if he's getting dumber! Big plans for 2015, a call from AC Newman and more!

episodes.seriesTitle: The Best Show with Tom Scharpling
episodes.title: It's The Best Show Christmas Show!
episodes.summary: It's the first ever Best Show Holiday Show. Philly Boy Roy calls to recap how his year went and to recite "Twas The Night Before Christmas Future Philly Style." Tom talks about Ringo Starr, Gary the Squirrel sings a song to AP Mike, Andy Kindler checks in and so much more!

episodes.seriesTitle: The Best Show with Tom Scharpling
episodes.title: Ballad of a Comeback Kid
episodes.summary: The long wait is over and The Best Show is back! Matthew Tompkins calls in to welcome Tom back! Kurt Vile checks in! Gary the Squirrel discusses his one-squirrel show and more!

episodes.seriesTitle: The Best Show with Tom Scharpling
episodes.title: The Best Show is BACK!
episodes.summary: It's all coming back. Tom's back. Jon's back. Gary's back. Mike's back. The callers are back. Newbridge is back! The Best Show is back and it's coming to get you! Listen live, Tuesday nights at thebestshow.net or subscribe here to this podcast and listen whenever you want. Get ready. Chumps are about to be steamrolled.
